clients.title: Justia Lawyer Directory Now Publishing Client Reviews
description: We are excited to announce that the Justia Lawyer Directory is now publishing client reviews. Together with the existing attorney peer ratings, these two critical points of view can inform consumers on an attorney's legal abilities as well as how well they communicate with their clients.
Getting online reviews can really boost your business. Take this opportunity to reach out to your clients, thank them for their business and encourage them to post a review on your profile.
